description: Just a few propositions to start with, concerning — no less — how you see the country and the world.
name: Country and World

description: Now, the economy. We're talking attitudes here, not the FTSE index.
name: Economy

description: Now a look at some of your personal social values...
name: Social Values

description: ...and how you see the wider society.
name: Wider Society

description: If you got through that okay, you'll find these propositions on religion a breeze.
name: Religion
